Topic.Title: Play a FULL Life of a Wolf Game!

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, guys! Click the link below to go to my FULL game for a life of a wolf! Play it a few times (there's different endings each time!) and then leave a review! The link's below. Thanks!

https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/gzssujltq0ywbobon-lh7g/full-life-of-a-wolf

Posts.EditableText:
Hello.

Is this the fifth time I've seen this post, or am I just crazy?

1. https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/ojzxcrhu00edla4tbwjlaa/play-a-full-life-of-a-wolf-game
2. https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/general/topic/naicfitatuuudn1t-gzuhg/play-a-full-life-of-a-wolf-game
3. https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/ttkwfish0e201bbmtr59ww/play-a-full-life-of-a-wolf-game
4. https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/_dkuv73hvk6gob1avodeog/play-a-full-life-of-a-wolf-game
5. https://textadventures.co.uk/forum/games/topic/brneuwvyhegatulh2bhr_q/play-a-full-life-of-a-wolf-game

---
Yep.  Fifth time.

...but I'm still crazy. (Bwahahahaha!)

Seriously, though: with five of the same post, it will be hard for everyone (including the OP) to follow the thread.  (Just a bit of constructive criticism.)

Happy gaming!
